title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: The Willoughbys,Kinnairds, Ruthvens, and Lord Mansfield, and oneof his sisters, with others, were there.

title: Hospitable England in the seventies;
author: Dana, Richard Henry
snippet: The Kinnairds belong to a very old family dating from 1176, Radulphus de Kinnard, under King William the Lion.

title: Hospitable England in the seventies;
author: Dana, Richard Henry
snippet: The Kinnairds are very religious and have three services on Sunday, but to-day there was no evening service, as the clergyman, Mr. Simmons, was unwell.
